definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ezr 9:2 unfaithful, treacherous act (NH [[מְעִילָה]]);—´[[מ]] Le 5:15 + 16 t.; [[מָָעַל]] Nu 5:12 + 2 t.; sf. [[מַעֲלוֹ]] Ez Eze 17:20 + 4 t.; [[מַעֲלָם]] Ez Eze 39:26 + 3 t.;—
ag. man: [[נשׁאר מעל]] Job 21:34 faithlessness remains (cf. Nu 5:12, Nu 5:27, Pr 16:10 under [[מָעַל]]).
elsewhere ag. God, c. [[בְּ]], Jos 22:22 (P); without [[בְּ]], 1Ch 9:1, 2Ch 29:19, 2Ch 33:19, Ezr 9:2, Ezr 9:4, Ezr 10:6.—[[מַעַל]] elsewhere only c. [[מָעַל]] q. v. (
